messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1371
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/18/01 3:56:02 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/18/01 3:56:02 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< We don't want babies to be born before they're ready, why does out society
insist they do other things before they're ready, and why do we buy into that
fallacy?
Debra >>


I am not for pushing my dd to read. I asked b/c she is asking me.

NICKI~

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1371
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/18/01 3:56:02 AM Mountain Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/18/01 3:56:02 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I was wanting to know-since she is asking-WHAT sort of advice I could
offer her that could possible be some help.

Thanks!
Esther >>

Book suggestions........... Kids Are Worth It by Barbara Coloroso and Kids
Parents Power Struggles by Mary Sheedy Kurchinka (maybe w/out the Sheedy)
Also Siblings W/out Rivalry by Faber and Mazlish.

NICKI~ alos is she on aol? Send her to the Positive Discipline board.
